entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning except snow inland in the morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
